Class JSONEntityFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.dao.file.JSONEntityFormat

    EntityFormat

    public class JSONEntityFormat
extends Object
implements EntityFormat

    Entity format that decodes JSON objects.

      • addAttribute

        Parameters:
